result.reason: The project currently lacks end-to-end UI automation; integrating a library like FlaUI into the existing SpecFlow project (mRemoteNGSpecs) will enable robust regression testing of user scenarios.
result.approach: Integrate FlaUI.UIA3 and FlaUI.Core packages into mRemoteNGSpecs. Create an AppDriver helper to manage the application process lifecycle. Implement SpecFlow hooks for setup/teardown. Add a basic 'SmokeTest.feature' to verify application launch and main window title presence.
